Description: Creates a new Table in SQL

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code: Add-SqlTable -TableName PatchyComputers -KeyType Sequential -Column MachineName, GroupName, PatchStatus, PatchWindowStart, PatchStartedAt, LastPatchedAt -DataType 'varchar(100)', 'varchar(100)', 'varchar(20)', 'datetime', 'datetime', 'datetime' -OutputSql -ConnectionStringOrSetting SqlAzureConnectionString
